about_the_game:
Who am “you”?
What you must do is FIND WHO YOU ARE. There are 13 stories that you can find. Through the 7 days activity, you can see a total of 13 egos(ending). Your initial choice divides the large branch of the self, and within the selected self, it is divided again according to your choice. It doesn't just end by checking at the end. Because all this ego eventually comes down to "me" in the game and “I”.

There are three main contents that players can do in this game: computer, door, and cell phone.
It can be said that the seven-day activities are relatively simple to do within these three contents. However, you can see the information, options, the influence between the contents, and the information difference. For example, information that was not shown in an article can be checked on personal social media.
Based on this information, the player can choose a choice. That option can affect the next day or the ending.
Also, you can find interesting rumors and elements in it, and maybe it resembles an aspect of the society that we live in.

Who am "I"?

name: Who am YOU?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10/11
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 52 MB RAM
  • Storage: 52 MB available space
  • VR Support: no
  • Additional Notes: no
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Who am “you”? Who am “you’”? depends on only the selection of “me”. There would be 7 days to find who you are. You may or may not notice the "I" at first during that time.
